name: The Game of Topeng Malangan
description: Mbah Sugeng is a guardian of the traditional dance studio in Malang City. The traditional dance named Tari Topeng Malangan. It requires a mask for every dancer to dance. Someday the mask were stolen by the evil spirits. Mbah Sugeng as the guardian of that traditional dance studio were very angry and he was intended to seek all the evil spirits around Malang City. Will you help him to fight all the evil spirits and bring the mask back ?
